snippet: Soldiers raided three Palestinian nongovernmental organizations in Ramallah before dawn on Tuesday, seizing computers and other equipment from two of them.
abstract: Israeli soldiers raid three Palestinian nongovernmental organizations in Ramallah, seizing computers and other equipment from two of them; military claims that offices were searched because they are affiliated with leftist group Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine.
lead_paragraph: Soldiers raided three Palestinian nongovernmental organizations in Ramallah before dawn on Tuesday, seizing computers and other equipment from two of them.

headline.main: West Bank: Israeli Military Raids 3 Palestinian Organizations
headline.print_headline: West Bank: Israeli Military Raids 3 Palestinian Organizations
